com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.eval

Class EvaluationContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.eval.EvaluationContextFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdEvaluationContextFactory

    public abstract class EvaluationContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    EvaluationContextFactory provides methods for creating EvaluationContext objects based on configuration information found in standard places. (TODO: Detail what these are)

    $Revision: 1.3 $
